channel.title: Machine Learning on Nicholas C. Jacobson

item.title: Digital Phenotyping Mood Disorders Reproducible R Code
item.description: Overview This post documents reproducible code accompanying the manuscript draft “Digital Biomarkers of Mood Disorders and Symptom Change” by Nicholas C. Jacobson, Hilary M. Weingardenm and Sabine Wilhelm (published in Nature Partner Journal (npj): Digital Medicine). This code uses machine learning to predict the diagnostic status and depressive symptom change in a a group of 23 patients with bipolar disorder or major depressive disorder and 32 non-disordered controls using actigraphy data.
